text: A gold chain weighing 10 sovereigns was snatched from a 42-year-old woman at her grocery shop in Avadi on Wednesday morning. Thanga Lakshmi of Moses Street, Gandhi Nagar, was at her grocery store around 8.15 a.m., when a stranger snatched the chain and hopped on a motorcycle that was driven by an accomplice.
title: Gold chain weighing 10 sovereigns snatched
